00069 
00070 TTracker::~TTracker()
00071 {
00072         m_scene = 0;
00073         m_azimuth.disconnect();
00074         m_zenith.disconnect();
00075 }
00076 
00077 void TTracker::Disconnect()
00078 {
00079         m_azimuth.disconnect();
00080         m_zenith.disconnect();
00081 }
00082 
00083 void TTracker::SetLightAngles(TLightKit * coinLight )
00084 {
00085         m_azimuth.connectFrom( &(coinLight->azimuth) );
00086         m_zenith.connectFrom( &(coinLight->zenith) );
00087 }
00088 
00089 void TTracker::SetAzimuthAngle( trt::TONATIUH_REAL* azimuthField )
00090 {
00091         m_azimuth.connectFrom( azimuthField );
00092 }
00093 
00094 void TTracker::SetZenithAngle( trt::TONATIUH_REAL* zenithField )
00095 {
00096         m_zenith.connectFrom( zenithField );
00097 }
00098 
00099 void TTracker::SetSceneKit( TSceneKit* scene )
00100 {
00101         m_scene = scene;
00102 }
00103 
00104 void TTracker::ConnectParentTranform(SoTransform* parentTransform)
00105 {
00106         parentTransform->translation.connectFrom( &outputTranslation );
00107         parentTransform->rotation.connectFrom( &outputRotation );
00108         parentTransform->scaleFactor.connectFrom( &outputScaleFactor );
00109         parentTransform->scaleOrientation.connectFrom( &outputScaleOrientation );
00110         parentTransform->center.connectFrom( &outputCenter );
00111 }
00112 
00113 void TTracker::SetEngineOutput(SoTransform* newTransform)
00114 {
00115         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputTranslation, SoSFVec3f, setValue( newTransform->translation.getValue() ) );
00116         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputRotation, SoSFRotation, setValue( newTransform->rotation.getValue() ) );
00117         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputScaleFactor, SoSFVec3f, setValue( newTransform->scaleFactor.getValue() ) );
00118         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputScaleOrientation, SoSFRotation, setValue( newTransform->scaleOrientation.getValue() ) );
00119         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputCenter, SoSFVec3f, setValue( newTransform->center.getValue() ) );
00120 }
00121 
00122 void TTracker::SetEngineOutputRotation(SbRotation rotation)
00123 {
00124         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputTranslation, SoSFVec3f, setValue( SbVec3f( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ) ) );
00125         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputRotation, SoSFRotation, setValue( rotation ) );
00126         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputScaleFactor, SoSFVec3f, setValue( SbVec3f( 1.0, 1.0, 1.0 ) ) );
00127         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputScaleOrientation, SoSFRotation, setValue( SbRotation() ) );
00128         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputCenter, SoSFVec3f, setValue( SbVec3f( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ) ) );
00129 }
00130 
00131 void TTracker::SetEngineOutputIdentity()
00132 {
00133         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputTranslation, SoSFVec3f, setValue( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ) );
00134         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputRotation, SoSFRotation, setValue( 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0 ) );
00135         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputScaleFactor, SoSFVec3f, setValue( 1.0, 1.0, 1.0 ) );
00136         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputScaleOrientation, SoSFRotation, setValue( 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0 ) );
00137         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputCenter, SoSFVec3f, setValue( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ) );
00138 }
00139 
00140 bool TTracker::IsConnected()
00141 {
00142         if( !m_azimuth.isConnected() ) return false;
00143         if( !m_zenith.isConnected() ) return false;
00144         return true;
00145 }
00146 
00147 Vector3D TTracker::GetGobalSunVector()
00148 {
00149         Vector3D globalSunVector( sin( m_azimuth.getValue() ) * sin( m_zenith.getValue() ),
00150                                  cos( m_zenith.getValue() ),
00151                                 -cos( m_azimuth.getValue() ) * sin( m_zenith.getValue() ) );
00152         return globalSunVector;
00153 }
00154 SbVec3f TTracker::GetGobalSunVect()
00155 {
00156         SbVec3f globalSunVector( sin( m_zenith.getValue() ) * sin( m_azimuth.getValue() ),
00157                                         cos( m_zenith.getValue() ),
00158                                         -sin( m_zenith.getValue() )*cos( m_azimuth.getValue() ) );
00159         return globalSunVector;
00160 }
00161 
00162 void TTracker::SetAnglesToScene()
00163 {
00164         if( m_scene )
00165         {
00166                 m_scene->azimuth.setValue( m_azimuth.getValue() );
00167                 m_scene->zenith.setValue( m_zenith.getValue() );
00168         }
00169 }
